portfolioGallery.title: Recycling Web App
portfolioGallery.desc: Convolutional Neural Network that classifies waste as either Recycling (Paper, Glass, Cardboard, Metal, Plastic), E-Waste, or Trash.

portfolioGallery.title: Netflix Movie Recommender
portfolioGallery.desc: Interactive Netflix movie and tv-show recommender

portfolioGallery.title: Predicting House Listings
portfolioGallery.desc: Using multiple linear regression to analyze and predict the sale price of houses.
